title: At The Trysting Place
marks:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in bro in lower margin, printed in brown: [AT THE TRYSTIN
description: two Native American young women, with their hair in pairs of buns, wearing dark dresses, light-colored moccasins and leggings, and blankets over their shoulders; girls stand next to rocks under foliage in a desert landscape
creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
